description: Joby is a California-based company building quiet, all-electric aircraft to connect people like never before. Quiet as a conversation and with the ability to take off and land vertically, the Joby aircraft will change the way we move while reducing the acoustic and climate footprint of flight.
name: Joby Aviation
tagline: We’re building quiet, all-electric aircraft to connect people like never before.

similar_companies.name: Zipline
similar_companies.industry: Transportation, Logistics, Supply Chain and Storage

updates.text:
We are pleased to announce Toyota Motor Corporation has committed to invest a further $500 million in Joby alongside plans to establish a manufacturing alliance for the first phase of commercialization. 

This investment, to be made in two equal tranches, builds on seven years of partnership and brings Toyota's total investment in Joby to $894 million.

Joby and Toyota have an incredibly well-aligned, long-term vision for the future of air transportation and we are honored to continue deepening our relationship.

Read more about the announcement: https://lnkd.in/gbD7J5Bz

To reduce transportation's climate impact, we need to deploy and scale big, bold climate solutions.
As part of NYC Climate Week, Joby participated in Emerson Collective's  Climate Science Fair to share our progress toward making truly emissions-free flight an everyday reality.

Our partner Atlantic Aviation, who operates aviation infrastructure across the United States, have announced they intend to install the Global Electric Aviation Charging System (GEACS) at the East 34th Street Heliport in Manhattan, marking the first site in NYC to be electrified for quiet, emissions-free air taxi service.

In November last year, we flew several exhibition flights from the Downtown Manhattan Helipad over the East River, showcasing the future of aviation to key stakeholders including the NYC Mayor, NY/NJ Port Authority, and NYC Economic Development Corporation.

The GEACS charging system is designed to enable the safe and efficient operations of all electric aircraft under development today. It allows for the rapid charging of multiple battery packs, with included coolant for thermal management as well as secure data offload.

https://lnkd.in/g9UqCm-w

NYC, it was great to see you at Grand Central!

We'd like to thank the thousands of commuters and visitors who stopped by to see our electric air taxi in-person, as well as key partners and stakeholders who joined us including Uber CEO Dara Khosrowshahi and Gail Grimmet from Delta Air Lines.

We'll be back...!

🛫⚡ Joby is at Grand Central Terminal in NYC! 🗽 

Come by to experience the future of flight with our quiet, emissions-free electric air taxi.

The Joby aircraft and our virtual-reality flight simulators will be open to the public until Saturday, October 5, during select hours.

Check out this link for more info: https://lnkd.in/eMaUMjaq

It’s Hydrogen Day, and we’re celebrating the tremendous potential of hydrogen to enable regional flight with no emissions except pure water.

This year, we have demonstrated multiple 500+ mile eVTOL flights with our hydrogen-electric technology demonstrator. U.S. Department of Energy (DOE)
